code: create_dag(   exposure_name,   outcome_name,   label_inquiry = "Causal Inquiry",   confounder_path = NULL,   surrogate_confounder = NULL,   collider_path = NULL,   notoriety_bias = NULL,   drug_competition_bias = NULL,   event_competition_bias = NULL,   background_dilution = NULL,   add_measurements = FALSE,   add_reporting = FALSE,   ascertainment_drug = NA,   ascertainment_event = NA,   additional_rows = "",   rankdir = "LR",   scenario = "inquiry" )

title: Create a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) — create_dag
text: exposure_name Character. name exposure variable. outcome_name Character. name outcome variable. label_inquiry Character. label inquiry. Default "Causal Inquiry". confounder_path List. list containing nodes signs (potentially direction) confounder path. deafault show . surrogate_confounder List. list containing surrogate confounder root. deafault show . collider_path List. list containing nodes signs collider path. deafault show . notoriety_bias Character. notoriety bias variable. deafault show . drug_competition_bias Character. drug competition bias variable. deafault show . event_competition_bias Character. event competition bias variable. deafault show . background_dilution List. list containing drug event background dilution. deafault show . add_measurements Logical. Whether add measurements. Default FALSE. add_reporting Logical. Whether add reporting Default FALSE. ascertainment_drug Character. Whether draw ascertainment bias introduced drug. Default NA. ascertainment_event Character. Whether draw ascertainment bias introduced event. Default NA. additional_rows Character. Parameter add lines customised DAGs. rankdir Character. direction graph layout. Default "LR", left right. can also set "TB" top bottom. scenario Character. causal scenario type. Default "inquiry", leaving question mark relation drug event. can also causal non-causal.
